title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-20][$250] Send invoice - Inconsistency in merchant requirement during and after invoice creation
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to FAB > Send invoice.
3. Enter amount and select a participant.
4. Create the invoice without merchant.
5. Click on the invoice preview in the workspace chat.
6. Click Merchant.
7. Save it without entering a merchant.

Expected result: There should be consistency whether Merchant is required in confirmation page and invoice details page.

Actual result: None
